dialogue.start: The "__(ARMY NAME)__" has placed a bounty on "__(UNIT NAME)__" for acts of raiding. Slaughter them and bring me their paws, and the "__(ARMY NAME)__" will reward you well.
dialogue.active: Bring me their paws, and we'll reward you well.
dialogue.completed: You have the paws? Great! Captain "__(UNIT NAME)__" was worried about the gnoll situation, and I'll like to tell him that we got it under control thanks to your efforts.
dialogue.delivered: The gnoll situation has calmed down ever since you took care of them. That'll teach them to leave us alone now.
